channel.title: Monster Drops
channel.description:
Anyone know how to make it so like, if you kill a monster like for e.g. 5 times, it drops something special like a gs or summet...
Thnx

item.title: Monster Drops
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

So, i could add summet into every char file and it tells them how much they’ve killed and if its like 5, next time they kill it they get like a spec drop?

How would i do this?

I’ve added a bit of it…

} else if (token.equals("Jad-Kills")) { playerGameCount = Integer.parseInt(token2); }
What would i put on,

playerGameCount = Integer.parseInt(token2); }Or would it go in more info?

Read full topic

item.title: Monster Drops
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Ill Pk You, post:1, topic:169062”]Anyone know how to make it so like, if you kill a monster like for e.g. 5 times, it drops something special like a gs or summet…

Thnx[/quote]

Change the method that is called when you kill them monster to log how many times a person has killed a monster and every time it’s divisible by 5, change it so it drops what you want it to drop.

Read full topic
